recipesJson.name: Krispy Treats
recipesJson.author: VenSyBoy
recipesJson.description:
Sweet, Gooey and Crunchy Rice Crispy Marshmallow Treats.

I wanted a saturated and sweet commercial style vape so i made one myself. 
TPA Marshmallow, TPA Vanilla custard and JF Bavarian cream ( can be substituted with TPA Bavarian Cream 1:1) make the creamy, heavy, thick and sweet taste.

FA Meringue ties everything together and gives a sweet sugary and airy cereal note as well as a bit of dairy.

Tpa Rice Crunchies its quite ricey and toasty and has some grainy AP note.
Usually over 3% it gets pretty cardboardy but, with all this heavy flavours i personally don't get any.

Also 1% of super sweet covers that cardboard note and gives that punchy commercial sweetness. (if its too much for your taste use 0.75%)
